description:
Wanting to come up with a brilliant invasion plan without interruptions, Keroro uses a cheap, discount copy robot to take his place!  Later, he and the platoon fulfill the rash promise made by that robot to take the Hinata family up to the moon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Leader Representative Robot Launches! / Keroro, the Moon is Luxurious
ケロロ 隊長代理ロボ出動! であります / ケロロ 月は豪華だ! であります
